Text: Re Follow up Cc we speak Enrons Credit and Legal teams are conversing on the best way to approach either an ISDA or a Long Form Confirm for papering the requested financial hedge Once Enron Credit is comfortable with Bellingham Cold Storage BCS Legal will prepare the necessary documentation once approved by BCSJohn Cameron I will quote work up some July executable numbers and attempt to contact the Robert Doug John C This will require everyones joint efforts in order to accomplish this in such a short time line BCS and John Cameron should anticipate a call from either or Enrons Credit and Legal personnel Thanks John Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Robert McCullough AM To John Malowney cc Doug Thomas John Cameron Subject Good morning We need numbers as soon as possible this morning also these must be serious not notional I am at I will be available at all day My email follows me around so you can always get me on email

Re Follow up Cc it and I appreciate everyones efforts John From Tana Jones on AM CDT To John CT cc Carol St CT Christian CT Tracy CT Shari CT Subject Re Follow up I just spoke to John Cameron the lawyer for the Company and our plan is to email him an associate of his and Doug Thomas the draft as soon as it is ready I will also fax John Cameron the draft Tracy Ngo in Credit is working up the credit and I am doing as much of the draft as I can pending credit Carol St Clair a lawyer in our Group here in Houston will be reviewing the draft As this is moving quickly please provide us with any updates of information John Malowney AM To Robert McCullough cc Doug Thomas John Cameron Tracy CT Shari CT Tana CT Subject Re Follow up Gentlemen as we speak Enrons Credit and Legal teams are conversing on the best way to approach either an ISDA or a Long Form Confirm for papering the requested financial hedge Once Enron Credit is comfortable with Bellingham Cold Storage BCS Legal will prepare the necessary documentation once approved by BCSJohn Cameron I will quote work up some July executable numbers and attempt to contact the Robert Doug John C This will require everyones joint efforts in order to accomplish this in such a short time line BCS and John Cameron should anticipate a call from either or Enrons Credit and Legal personnel Thanks John Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Robert McCullough AM To John Malowney cc Doug Thomas John Cameron Subject Good morning We need numbers as soon as possible this morning also these must be serious not notional I am at I will be available at all day My email follows me around so you can always get me on email

Re We need actual bottom line numbers no notional stuff right Cc pass there is no sense going through yesterdays fire drill when we dont have the necessary paper in place in order to execute We appreciate the interest next time with a little more forewarning Im sure Enron will competitively be in the hunt Let us know is youd like us to continue working on the necessary contracts for future use Thanks John Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Robert McCullough AM To John Malowney cc Subject We need actual bottom line numbers no notional stuff right Clients are hopping up and down I am expecting a beer for my loyal Enron services this week
Re Bellingham Cold Storage Cc Tracy I appreciate you quick response John
Re Bellingham Cold Storage ISDA Masterthe queen thanks for your efforts

RE Bellingham Cold Storage BCS Cc that will not be able to execute the proposed financial hedge with BCS today but all parties should be commended for their efforts Monday July rd and Tuesday the th are recognised Enron holidays I will be out of the office returning Monday July th If there is a desire to pursue this matter in my absence please contact Mr Chris Foster via email or telephone Thanks again John

Re Bellingham Cold Storage ISDA MasterI was out of the office last week did you or Carol hear anything from Bellingham Cold Storage From Tana Jones on PM CDT To cc John CT Tracy CT Carol St CT Subject Bellingham Cold Storage ISDA Master Attached please find a draft of the Schedule to the ISDA Master Agreement between Bellingham Cold Storage Co and Enron North America Corp Please call Carol St Clair Assistant General Counsel at with any questions or comments you may have My direct dial number is

ISDA for Cowlitz PUD Cc you email and US mail an ISDA to Mr Gary A Huhta co Cowlitz PUD PO Box Longview WA with an email address of If need be Garys phone number Thanks John

Re Bellingham Cold Storage ISDA Mastera couple of things have you heard anything back from Bellingham Cold Storage and secondly Id like you to send an ISDA to the following party Let me know if you have any questions Thanks John Mr Allan Warman Energy Resources Management The Boeing Company PO Box MC AXF Seattle WA If need be his phone number is From Tana Jones on PM CDT To cc John CT Tracy CT Carol St CT Subject Bellingham Cold Storage ISDA Master Attached please find a draft of the Schedule to the ISDA Master Agreement between Bellingham Cold Storage Co and Enron North America Corp Please call Carol St Clair Assistant General Counsel at with any questions or comments you may have My direct dial number is

ISDA for BoeingBoeing tells me that they have not received the ISDA we promised them What insight can you provide me with John

RE Preparation of an ISDALiquide has requested an ISDA be prepared for their review Feel free to contact Mr Mark Darnell Post Oak Boulevard Houston Texas or PO Box with the same Zip code etc Thanks I appreciate it John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Darnell Mark Mark irliquidecom AM To John Malowney cc Subject RE DJ MidColumbia Electricity Price Index Yep lets try it again Please email us your latest agreement Thnks Mark Darnell Energy Manager Air Liquide America telephone facsimile pager Original Message From John Malowney mailto Sent Monday August PM To Darnell Mark Subject DJ MidColumbia Electricity Price Index Mark attached is the most recent historical MC prices that we have Historically speaking the nonfirm always trades for less than the firm index I would stay with the nonfirm index Do you want us to contact you regarding getting an ISDA in place between our two companies John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on PM Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From djenergy picpcx PM To cc Pergher Gunther Onukogu Ernest Subject DJ MidColumbia Electricity Price Index See attached file MidCxls

RE ISDAa little while back I requested you send Air Liquide a sample ISDA which I know you did since then they have lost it so would you be so kind as to send them another one If you need any additional information or whatever please let me know Thanks Again John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Darnell Mark Mark irliquidecom PM To John Malowney cc Subject RE ISDA yes are prices coming down yet Mark Darnell Energy Manager Air Liquide America telephone facsimile pager Original Message From John Malowney mailto Sent Tuesday August PM To Darnell Mark Subject Re ISDA Do we need to send you another one Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From Darnell Mark picpcx Mark irliquidecom PM To John CT cc Subject ISDA I dont have it yet Or I do not know where I placed it Either way I dont have it Mark Darnell Energy Manager Air Liquide America telephone facsimile pager

RE Sample ISDAwould you please email a sample ISDA to Mr Ray Cunningham of Exxon and let me know when youve done so Thanks again John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From AM To cc Subject RE Staying in touch Thanks for keeping in touch We purchased an indexed product Tell me more about your financial offering I am interested Original Message From John Malowney SMTP Sent Tuesday August PM To Subject Staying in touch Ray its been sometime since weve spoken I just want to touch bases with you and see if there was anything we might be able to do I could not remember if you purchased a fixed price and indexed price product and if so had any interest in financially fixing the price If so or if I can be of assistance on another front please do not hesitate to contact me Thanks John

Re Wah Changcan you answer this for me thanks John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on PM Jan M King PM To John CT cc Subject Re Wah Chang I dont believe we do John But you should check with Tana Jones in Houston She handles ISDAs John Malowney PM To Jan M CT Tracy CT cc Subject Wah Chang Jan do we have an ISDA with Wah Chang They are owned by Allegheny Technologies Tracy can you start looking at their creditfinancials for me Thanks John

RE Sample ISDAget back to you Thanks John From Tana Jones on AM CDT To John CT cc Subject RE Sample ISDA John Sorry about taking so long to get back to you on this Re sample master agreementswe recently had a group meeting where we were discouraged to send out sample masters What appears to be happening is that a customer gets a sample master wno credit and then when we finally send them a real master wcredit they are somewhat hacked off because the end up being incredibly longer once credit is added If possible can we not talk to Credit about sending them a real master Let me know your thinking John Malowney AM To Tana CT cc Subject RE Sample ISDA Tana would you please email a sample ISDA to Mr Ray Cunningham of Exxon and let me know when youve done so Thanks again John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From AM To cc Subject RE Staying in touch Thanks for keeping in touch We purchased an indexed product Tell me more about your financial offering I am interested Original Message From John Malowney SMTP Sent Tuesday August PM To Subject Staying in touch Ray its been sometime since weve spoken I just want to touch bases with you and see if there was anything we might be able to do I could not remember if you purchased a fixed price and indexed price product and if so had any interest in financially fixing the price If so or if I can be of assistance on another front please do not hesitate to contact me Thanks John

RE Need your buyin Cc Please try to keep this as confidential as possible so as not to offend those on the Trading Floor who applied for the position and feel they are still be considered Thanks John Original Message From Kearney Julie Sent Friday September PM To Badeer Robert Motley Matt Fischer Mark Richter Jeff Foster Chris H Belden Tim Choi Paul Rosman Stewart Driscoll Gina Swerzbin Mike Cc Rodriguez Grace Davidson Debra Mehrer Anna Malowney John Subject Need your buyin Importance High John Malowney has been interviewing for the Middle Market Analyst position After a series of interviews John has selected who he feels is the best candidate Dee Outama We would like your opinion and give you the opportunity to meet Dee If you would be able to meet w Dee anytime on Monday between AM PM please respond to this message as soon as possible Thanks and as always your participation is always appreciated Julie K PS Have a great weekend

EEI Master with PPL Montana Cc FYI Recently we successfully negotiated and executed an EEI Master Sales Purchase Agreement with PPL Montana Per a recent telephone conversation between PPL and Marcus Nettelton PPL and intends is to use the WSPP Agreement for all physical transactions except in the rare instance of entering into a physical MW for MW exchangeswap which we recently completed with them Net net plan on all transactions with PPL be papered under the WSPP unless you and their Trader specifically agree to use the EEI which would be our preference Please do not hesitate to let me know if you have any questions Thanks John

FW Thailandpst Original Message From Erickson Connie Sent Wednesday December AM To Malowney John Subject Re Thailand Hi John Would be happy to help him outjust have him either email me or give me a call Hope all is well with yousuch changes going on Just returned from a trip to Italy as that is where our son is nowwhat a great time Keep in touch and have a happy holiday season Connie Malowney John John NRONcom AM Connie Matt Motley who I work with over here is interested in going to Thailand for his honeymoon I told him that your son taught school there and that you had visited numerous times thus making you an excellent source of information If you would not mind answering a couple questions for him Im sure he would really appreciate it I highly recommended Puket for starters Thanks again and hope all is going well John This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Thailand Cc Connie Matt Motley who I work with over here is interested in going to Thailand for his honeymoon I told him that your son taught school there and that you had visited numerous times thus making you an excellent source of information If you would not mind answering a couple questions for him Im sure he would really appreciate it I highly recommended Puket for starters Thanks again and hope all is going well John
Blank ISDAcan you have someone forward me a blank ISDA that I will be forwarding on to Willamette Industries Thanks John
Blank ISDAcan you have someone forward me a blank ISDA that I will be forwarding on to Willamette Industries Thanks John

MPC Energy Imbalance II Cc PST Bill Spoke to Mike Cashell again this morning If you remember when we met with him this Spring he mentioned that Idaho Power had the right to demand energy and or wheel through MPCs system that could cause them to be outofbalance up to of the time Starting yesterday Idaho initiated this process Mike has requested Idaho express their intentions on a preschedule basis where he in turn will notify you Today and throughout the weekend MPC plans to be in a deficit position You might want to contact Mike to work out a prenotification process so as to help to identify trends so that our RealTime group will be able to better anticipate MPCs needs Thanks John

Montana Power Company MPC Energy Imbalance Cc PST Bill Mike Cashell MPCs Transmission Mgr just phoned me concerned beca use MPCs RealTime group requested EPMI purchase energy for them under our existing Energy Imbalance structure and was notified by our RealTime gro up that due to the newly implemented FERC price cap we were have difficult y securing any resources Just to clarify things we are settling MPCs Ch oice customers Energy Imbalance position and PPL Montana has the right to any length resulting from MPCs domestic load Energy Imbalance In othe r words MPC is settling two separate Energy Imbalance accounts so during t he hour they may be turning energy back to PPL Montana while at the same time finding themselves short for the Choice loads During the recent bull ish pricing conditions Choice customer were leaving themselves long as of late MPC is experiencing the Choice customers doing the opposite positio ning themselves short The net result is that MPC will most likely be expe cting us to fill a short position from this point on so Id really like to see what we can do to honor their requests mindful of the favorable posit ion weve enjoyed over the last several months Let me know if youd like t o discuss this further or better yet if youve got a workable solution to the problem In the meantime thanks again to you and your staff for the o utstanding performance thus far in dealing with MPC John

EEI Master with PPL Montana Cc successfully negotiated and executed an EEI Master Sales Purchase Agreement with PPL Montana Per a recent telephone conversation between PPL and Marcus Nettelton PPL and intends is to use the WSPP Agreement for all physical transactions except in the rare instance of entering into a physical MW for MW exchangeswap which we recently completed with them Net net plan on all transactions with PPL be papered under the WSPP unless you and their Trader specifically agree to use the EEI which would be our preference Please do not hesitate to let me know if you have any questions Thanks John
PPL Term Sheet Cc the Term Sheet I spoke of let me know if you have any questions Anna Let Diana and I know ASAP if you receive the signed Cover Sheet from a Mr Joel Cook of PPL Montana Thanks John

RE EPMI contacts Cc contacts will be able to assist Air Products during the term of our physical transaction scheduled to begin on RealTime Managed by Mr Bill Williams PreSchedule Managed by Cara Semperger Donald Robinson and Diana Scholtes will be involved with the prescheduling of Air Products energy My office phone number is with a cellular phone number of A general rule of thumb would be we preschedule the next days energy by AM PPT the day prior to delivery except for on Thursday mornings we preschedule Friday and Saturday and on Friday we preschedule Sunday and Monday Holidays are prescheduled by the specific Holiday but if youll check with us in advance well be able to provide with the preschedule deadline Air Products is free to make changes at anytime and internally we will get the request to the appropriate person Thanks again for the opportunity to become Air Products Energy Provider of choice let me know if you have any questions and or concerns John

Term Sale to Air Products and Chemicals Cc a term sale to Air Products behind Puget Sound Energy The transaction is to be confirmed by the Houston office using the mutually agreed upon Confirmation Letter Air Products will sign the negotiated EEI at the same time If anyone has any questions please let me know at your earliest convenience Thanks for everyones assistance John
Sale to Cenex Cc EPMI sold Cenex MW flat delivered to the Montana Power Company MPC System Border for Thursday and Friday July MWh Thanks John

RE Cc to exchange crucial phone numbers and contacts with you If youll reciprocate with key contacts for Holnam I would appreciate it If for some reason I am unavailable and you wish to either purchase or sell MW volumes please feel free to contact Diana Scholtes on Our PreSchedule one day or longer scheduling requirements phone number is The two ladies most involved with scheduling loads in the Montana region are Stacy Runswick and Cara Semperger Our Hour RealTime less than one day and up to the next hour phone number is You have my office phone number and my cellular phone number is I do not anticipate you needing anyones number but my own nor do I anticipate having to contact anyone but you but I did want to exchange this information just in case Once again we appreciate the opportunity to serve your Montana loads and look forward to working together in the future John

RE Key contactsc Cc to exchange crucial phone numbers and contacts with you If youll reciprocate with key contacts for Express Pipeline I would appreciate it If for some reason I am unavailable and you wish to either purchase or sell MW volumes please feel free to contact Diana Scholtes on Our PreSchedule one day or longer scheduling requirements phone number is The two ladies most involved with scheduling loads in the Montana region are Stacy Runswick and Cara Semperger Our Hour RealTime less than one day up to the next hour phone number is You have my office phone number and my cellular phone number is I do not anticipate you needing anyones number but my own nor do I anticipate having to contact anyone but you but I did want to exchange this information just in case Once again we appreciate the opportunity to serve your Montana loads and look forward to working together in the future John

Sale to Holnam Inc DBA Holnam Cement Cc a sale to Holnam using our newly executed EEI Master It is scheduled to start so it will need to be scheduled Heather has agreed to enter the transaction into the Transaction Log Mike Purcell has agreed to notify MPC Let me know if anyone has any questions Thanks Again John

Sale to AEC Pipelines DBA Express Pipeline Cc a sale to Express Pipelines Mike Purcell needs to register Express Pipeline with MPC The binding confirmation needs to have two signature lines on it for Express Pipelines approval The deal needs to be entered into the Log Book Thanks for everyones efforts John
Sale to Cenex Harvest States Cc attached let me know if you have any questions Thanks John

Sale to LouisianaPacific LP Cc a sale done late Friday afternoon to LP that needs to be entered into the Trade log Per Paul Radous the credit hold will be less than MWh Christian Yoder is familiar with the needed confirmation If anyone has any questions please let me know Monday as Ill be traveling the remainder of the week Thanks again for everyones efforts John

Sale to Ash Grove Cement AGC Cc a two tiered sale to AGC of which the second component needs an immediate Confirmation and executable EEI Master for AGCs signature AGC is expecting the EEI today their consultant has already reviewed a blank EEI and with no credit provisions this should not be a problem If anyone has any questions please contact me ASAP The following is my contact Mr Dick Johnson Ash Grove Cement Hwy Clancy MT FAX Email

SmurfitStone Energy Imbalance MWs that RealTime failed to sell this morning will be credited to SmurfitStone as the schedule was in their name If youll get me the details Ill be more than happy to discuss with them the possibility of EPMI being reimbursed for the long position John

Purchase from Montana Power Company MPC Cc a purchase made today from MPC on Mike Swerzbins book This is an extension if you will of an existing month of May transaction with additional MW volumes If anyone has any questions please let me know Thanks John

FW ISDAsome time ago we forwarded LouisianaPacific LP an ISDA for their review and consideration They have responded with the following comments Can you give me a hand in addressing them John Original Message From Roger Dieringer Roger PCorpcomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESRogerDieringerCRogerEDieringerLPCorpEc omE NRONcom Sent Wednesday May AM To Malowney John Subject ISDA John Listed below are several issues we need to have addressed prior to signing the agreement Curt Stevens name is consistently misspelled throughout the documents We should also be sure that our new corporate address is used SW Broadway Suite Portland Oregon Enron doesnt like late payments or early termination of their agreements Interest on amounts owing is compounded daily John this needs to be changed What other decent arrangements can be put in here I thought only loan sharks compounded daily Part of the Schedule to the Master Agreement should be amended to provide that LP may satisfy its obligation to provide updated financial information by posting it to EDGAR or on the web Enron now has that ability We dont have the ISDA Definitions or the ISDA Commodity Derivatives Definitions cited in Parts and of the Schedule to the Master Agreement I wasnt able to locate them on the web We will need these provide to LP The Credit Support Annex is designed to apply to ISDA Agreements subject to New York law Our Agreement is subject to Texas law We may not have the proper form Let me know at your convenience Thanks Roger

Re Oregon Steel Mills OSM Cc called requesting we present them with a contract today any chance of making this happen Tracy Ngo AM To Wendy NRON cc Edward nron John CT Dave CT Subject Oregon Steel Mills OSM Wendy Please run the due diligence on Oregon Steel Mills Were looking at presenting them both a financial and physical gas contract Once youve had a chance to propose some credit terms lets discuss Thanks Tracy Forwarded by Tracy NgoPDXECT on AM John Malowney PM To Tracy CT Shari CT cc Subject Oregon Steel Mills OSM We met with OSM and have another meeting scheduled for tomorrow to discuss proposed structures hopefully to be followed by specific pricing Were talking average monthly volumes of MMBTU for approximately months at a price around MMBTU Im sending you this as a reminder as if and when were able to agree upon pricing and a proposed structure well need to paper it by weeks end At this time we could be going either physically or financially Thanks John

RE Montana powernsf Sounds good to me let sleeping dogs lie Lets internally add the needed description and move on I really dont want to confuse MPC with yet another confirmation Thanks John Original Message From Cason Sharen Sent Wednesday May AM To Symes Kate Cc Malowney John Subject Re Montana power If John Malowney is okay with the confirmation he reviewed Im fine I made the changes he suggested and sent it out so if nothing else needs to be done for the confirmation then yes please add some notes in the comment section of deal entry about what happened Thanks Kate Symes PM To Sharen CT cc Subject Re Montana power OLE Object StdOleLink Im really sorry about the confusion I actually just got filled in myself I entered these deals for Mike Swerzbin yesterday but he gave me an incorrect delivery point midcolumbia instead of montana system border Then Cara Semperger in Scheduling went in to change the delivery point and felt that the deal should be combined into one with three legs instead of three separate deals So in the end she killed and and added two legs to Im not sure she talked to John Malowney about any of this otherwise he probably would have told her that he already approved the confirm letter Please let me know if youd like comments added to this deal and Ill do it right away Thanks for your help on this Kate From Sharen Cason PM To Kate CT cc Subject Montana power Help Im confused Yesterday I prepared a confirmation for three Montana Power deals I sent it to John Malowney and he approved it and I faxed it out Today I noticed two of the deals have been killed and two legs added to the other deal I think it is the same deal but can someone put notes into the deals saying what they did and why Thanks

LouisianaPacific LP natural gas Cc Barry I understand you have some reservations about my involvement with LPs request for assistance to financially hedge their natural gas exposure I have no problem working with Dave Fuller as I did regarding another entity or with whomever from your group regarding this matter as long as I am financially rewarded for my time and efforts As you will see for the attached letter from LP I have put a great deal of time and effort into positioning Enron as LPs preferred ESP to the point of being asked to join their internal energy team If you would please advice me how youd like to proceed and well take it from there Thanks John John M Energy Team Requestdoc

RE EPMI contacts Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Roger the following contacts will be able to assist Air Products during the term of our physical transaction scheduled to begin on RealTime Managed by Mr Bill Williams PreSchedule Managed by Cara Semperger Donald Robinson and Diana Scholtes will be involved with the prescheduling of Air Products energy My office phone number is with a cellular phone number of A general rule of thumb would be we preschedule the next days energy by AM PPT the day prior to delivery except for on Thursday mornings we preschedule Friday and Saturday and on Friday we preschedule Sunday and Monday Holidays are prescheduled by the specific Holiday but if youll check with us in advance well be able to provide with the preschedule deadline Air Products is free to make changes at anytime and internally we will get the request to the appropriate person Thanks again for the opportunity to become Air Products Energy Provider of choice let me know if you have any questions and or concerns John

RE Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Ralph I wanted to exchange crucial phone numbers and contacts with you If youll reciprocate with key contacts for Holnam I would appreciate it If for some reason I am unavailable and you wish to either purchase or sell MW volumes please feel free to contact Diana Scholtes on Our PreSchedule one day or longer scheduling requirements phone number is The two ladies most involved with scheduling loads in the Montana region are Stacy Runswick and Cara Semperger Our Hour RealTime less than one day and up to the next hour phone number is You have my office phone number and my cellular phone number is I do not anticipate you needing anyones number but my own nor do I anticipate having to contact anyone but you but I did want to exchange this information just in case Once again we appreciate the opportunity to serve your Montana loads and look forward to working together in the future John

RE Key contactsc Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Jamie I wanted to exchange crucial phone numbers and contacts with you If youll reciprocate with key contacts for Express Pipeline I would appreciate it If for some reason I am unavailable and you wish to either purchase or sell MW volumes please feel free to contact Diana Scholtes on Our PreSchedule one day or longer scheduling requirements phone number is The two ladies most involved with scheduling loads in the Montana region are Stacy Runswick and Cara Semperger Our Hour RealTime less than one day up to the next hour phone number is You have my office phone number and my cellular phone number is I do not anticipate you needing anyones number but my own nor do I anticipate having to contact anyone but you but I did want to exchange this information just in case Once again we appreciate the opportunity to serve your Montana loads and look forward to working together in the future John

MPC Energy Imbalance II Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Bill Spoke to Mike Cashell again this morning If you remember when we met with him this Spring he mentioned that Idaho Power had the right to demand energy and or wheel through MPCs system that could cause them to be outofbalance up to of the time Starting yesterday Idaho initiated this process Mike has requested Idaho express their intentions on a preschedule basis where he in turn will notify you Today and throughout the weekend MPC plans to be in a deficit position You might want to contact Mike to work out a prenotification process so as to help to identify trends so that our RealTime group will be able to better anticipate MPCs needs Thanks John

RE Montana Power Company MPC Energy Imbalance Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Ill convey your efforts to MPC Thanks John Original Message From Williams III Bill SentThursday June PM ToMalowney John CcBland Todd Dean Craig Guzman Mark Harasin Leaf Linder Eric Merris Steven Meyers Bert Porter David V Slinger Ryan Solberg Gei r Symes Kate Williams III Bill SubjectRE Montana Power Company MPC Energy Imbalance John We have asked every single counterparty in the NW to sell us energy We bi d to PowerX and were told that they were abiding by the cap We are working hard to get them the energy that they need and will continue to do so Bill Original Message From Malowney John SentThursday June PM ToWilliams III Bill CcPortland Shift SubjectMontana Power Company MPC Energy Imbalance Bill Mike Cashell MPCs Transmission Mgr just phoned me concerned beca use MPCs RealTime group requested EPMI purchase energy for them under our existing Energy Imbalance structure and was notified by our RealTime gro up that due to the newly implemented FERC price cap we were have difficult y securing any resources Just to clarify things we are settling MPCs Ch oice customers Energy Imbalance position and PPL Montana has the right to any length resulting from MPCs domestic load Energy Imbalance In othe r words MPC is settling two separate Energy Imbalance accounts so during t he hour they may be turning energy back to PPL Montana while at the same time finding themselves short for the Choice loads During the recent bull ish pricing conditions Choice customer were leaving themselves long as of late MPC is experiencing the Choice customers doing the opposite positio ning themselves short The net result is that MPC will most likely be expe cting us to fill a short position from this point on so Id really like to see what we can do to honor their requests mindful of the favorable posit ion weve enjoyed over the last several months Let me know if youd like t o discuss this further or better yet if youve got a workable solution to the problem In the meantime thanks again to you and your staff for the o utstanding performance thus far in dealing with MPC John

Montana Power Company MPC Energy Imbalance Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Bill Mike Cashell MPCs Transmission Mgr just phoned me concerned beca use MPCs RealTime group requested EPMI purchase energy for them under our existing Energy Imbalance structure and was notified by our RealTime gro up that due to the newly implemented FERC price cap we were have difficult y securing any resources Just to clarify things we are settling MPCs Ch oice customers Energy Imbalance position and PPL Montana has the right to any length resulting from MPCs domestic load Energy Imbalance In othe r words MPC is settling two separate Energy Imbalance accounts so during t he hour they may be turning energy back to PPL Montana while at the same time finding themselves short for the Choice loads During the recent bull ish pricing conditions Choice customer were leaving themselves long as of late MPC is experiencing the Choice customers doing the opposite positio ning themselves short The net result is that MPC will most likely be expe cting us to fill a short position from this point on so Id really like to see what we can do to honor their requests mindful of the favorable posit ion weve enjoyed over the last several months Let me know if youd like t o discuss this further or better yet if youve got a workable solution to the problem In the meantime thanks again to you and your staff for the o utstanding performance thus far in dealing with MPC John
